#cloud-config

timezone: Europe/Paris


ssh_authorized_keys:
 - ssh-rsa  cyrille@cyrilleleclerc.com
 
packages:
- yum-utils
- java-1.6.0-openjdk
- tomcat6

runcmd:
 - [ sh, -xc, "echo Relaunch Tomcat6" ]
 - [ /etc/init.d/tomcat6, restart ]
 - [ sh, -xc, "echo Enabling Tomcat6 for Boot Launch" ]
 - [chkconfig, --levels, 235, tomcat6, on ]
